channel.title: teaching on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in teaching on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: supervisions and teaching
item.description: supervisions I am currently co-supervising - together with Olga Kuryatnikova and Patrick J.F. Groenen - the research internship of Leon Czarnecki within his Business Data Science research MSc. The internship focuses on investigating the applicability of alternating direction method of multipliers (admm) for statistical and data science problems I am currently supervising the BSc Honours Class thesis of Arianna Giuffra and Beatriz Polak Baldo. The thesis applies linear modeling to study the relationship between ESG scores and financial performance across firms in the EU and China
